history.proof: intros t. induction t using term_ind. hauto use: invar_0, invar_1, term_list_term_ind, invar_2.

exceptions.tactic: intros n m d a H1 H2.

ctx: intros n m d a' H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: The reference H was not found in the current environment.

ctx: intros n m d a' H1 H2.
exceptions.tactic: intros a t IHt n m d a0 H1 H2 H3 H4.

ctx: intros n m d a' H1 H2.
exceptions.tactic: intros a' t IHt n m d a0 H1 H2 H3 H4.

ctx: intros n m d a' H1 H2.
exceptions.tactic: intros a'' t IHt n m d a0 H1 H2 H3 H4.

ctx: intros n m d a' H1 H2.
exceptions.tactic: intros a'' t' IHt n m d a0 H1 H2 H3 H4.

ctx: intros n m d a' H1 H2.
exceptions.tactic: intros a'' t' IHt n' m d a0 H1 H2 H3 H4.

ctx: intros n m d a' H1 H2.
exceptions.tactic: intros a'' t' IHt n' m' d a0 H1 H2 H3 H4.

ctx: intros n m d a' H1 H2.
exceptions.tactic: intros a'' t' IHt n' m' d' a0 H1 H2 H3 H4.

ctx: intros n m d a' H1 H2.
exceptions.tactic: intros a'' t' IHt n' m' d' a0 H1' H2 H3 H4.

ctx: intros n m d a' H1 H2.
exceptions.tactic: intros a'' t' IHt n' m' d' a0 H1' H2' H3 H4.

ctx: intros n m d a' H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment a : ad t : term_list n, m : nat d : preDTA a' : ad H1 : rec_term d a' (app a t) n = true H2 : n <= m Unable to unify "forall (n m : nat) (d : preDTA) (a : ad), rec_term d a (app ?M1858 ?M1859) n = true -> n <= m -> rec_term d a (app ?M1858 ?M1859) m = true" with "rec_term d a' (app a t) m = true".

ctx: intros n m d a' H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: The reference IHt was not found in the current environment.

ctx: intros n m d a' H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment H : forall (a : ad) (t : term_list), invar_list t -> invar_term (app a t) a : ad t : term_list n, m : nat d : preDTA a' : ad H1 : rec_term d a' (app a t) n = true H2 : n <= m Unable to unify "forall (n m : nat) (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list), rec_list_terms d p (tcons ?M2254 ?M2256) n = true -> n <= m -> rec_list_terms d p (tcons ?M2254 ?M2256) m = true" with "rec_term d a' (app a t) m = true".

ctx: intros n m d a' H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment H3 : forall t : term, invar_term t -> forall t0 : term_list, invar_list t0 -> invar_list (tcons t t0) H0 : forall (a : ad) (t : term_list), invar_list t -> invar_term (app a t) a : ad t : term_list n, m : nat d : preDTA a' : ad H1 : rec_term d a' (app a t) n = true H2 : n <= m Unable to unify "term_high ?M2724 <= term_high_0 (tcons ?M2724 ?M2725)" with "rec_term d a' (app a t) m = true".

original: intros t. induction t using term_ind. - intros n m d a H1 H2. simpl. intros. apply H. auto. - intros a t IHt n m d a0 H1 H2 H3 H4. simpl. apply invar_1. apply IHt; auto. apply invar_2; auto. apply high_aux_3.
